Did you know that interviewing on camera is one of the easiest and most powerful ways to rapidly create quality content that will boost your business in multiple ways?

JOIN OVER 2000 SUCCESSFUL STUDENTS ALREADY TAKING THIS COURSE!

Be taught by a proven expert

Start doing fantastic video interviews, with no outlay and no experience whatsoever.

Become an accomplished video interviewer rapidly and easily by following this course. 

When you know how, it's a massively powerful way to generate fresh and original content that can punch through the multitude of dross out there, and be a key tool for you to boost your brand, reputation and business!

If you're looking for great video interviews without some study and effort, please don't take this course. You'll need to study the course, step-by-step and implement its teaching to enjoy success. NOW includes step-by-step slides to help you progress rapidly!

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

About this course:

  • Over 2000 happy students - exclusively five-star reviews!

SEE HOW I GET:

You won't need any prior experience or specialist equipment to get started with this. I show you how to approach, plan, conduct, edit and distribute video interviews of whatever length. I go step-by-step, and hold nothing back.

I give concrete examples of how to plan and conduct great video interviews. You are not only getting a course in this essential skill, you're getting valuable insights into how a professional film director thinks, plans and executes his work.

Whether you have experience in filmmaking and video interviewing already, or not, this course will help you hugely to advance your skills to immediately start creating outstanding content for your blogs, social media, videos and films and elsewhere.

You'll learn:

… And much more!
title: Capturing Passion: Video Interviewing to Engage Any Audience
